bug.author: George3d6
bug.summary: Travis tests no failing when error occur

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/George3d6>@George3d6</denchmark-link> I think that is expected from our configurations. We ran the script for tests <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mindsdb/mindsdb/blob/7e3375943940af53c18f21bcc86872b0a813ef63/.travis.yml#L41>here</denchmark-link> and it executed properly. Here, scripts did not fail. Only the output of those scripts is having errors. I guess we need to do more than this here.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/George3d6>@George3d6</denchmark-link> Please verify if <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mindsdb/mindsdb/pull/373>#373</denchmark-link> works and I guess we'll be good with this.

Ok, so.... the reasons why this was happening were varied, I believe the current tests suite properly exists with a non-success code whenever something fails, so this should be fixed right now. Closing,
